## Steps to reproduce
```none
Run any batch file located on an IBM MVFS mounted drive.  (MultiVersion File System)
```

## Expected behavior

```powershell
PS C: > echo 'echo hello' > hello.bat
PS C: > .\hello.bat
hello
```

## Actual behavior

```powershell
PS M: > echo 'echo hello' > hello.bat
PS M: > .\hello.bat
OperationStopped: The parameter is incorrect.
```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->
```powershell
echo $PSVersionTable
```
```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.2.0-preview.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.2.0-preview.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18363
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

Started failing with 7.1.0.  Works fine on 7.0.3.
```
